flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: Make an easy Origami Heart.
lines.text_raw: Make an easy Origami Heart.

lines.text: Start with paper color side down.
lines.text_raw: Start with paper color side down.

lines.text: Fold a + in the paper.
lines.text_raw: Fold a + in the paper.

lines.text: Fold bottom edge to center crease. Crease well.
lines.text_raw: Fold bottom edge to center crease. Crease well.

lines.text: Turn paper over.
lines.text_raw: Turn paper over.

lines.text: Fold as shown in picture 3.
lines.text_raw: Fold as shown in picture 3.

lines.text: Do the same on other side. This is called an airplane fold.
lines.text_raw: Do the same on other side. This is called an airplane fold.

lines.text: The first picture shows the paper after your airplane fold.
lines.text_raw: The first picture shows the paper after your airplane fold.

lines.text: Turn the unit over.
lines.text_raw: Turn the unit over.

lines.text: Fold another airplane fold as shown.
lines.text_raw: Fold another airplane fold as shown.

lines.text: Fold top point down to bottom. Crease only the center color section. Do not crease the white.
lines.text_raw: Fold top point down to bottom. Crease only the center color section. Do not crease the white.

lines.text: Fold back the top section to reveal the white.
lines.text_raw: Fold back the top section to reveal the white.

lines.text: Unfold. Fold the white tips inward along the crease.
lines.text_raw: Unfold. Fold the white tips inward along the crease.

lines.text: Unfold the white tips.
lines.text_raw: Unfold the white tips.

lines.text: Open one side just a bit, and reverse your fold. We are hiding the white tips inside.
lines.text_raw: Open one side just a bit, and reverse your fold. We are hiding the white tips inside.

lines.text: It should look like picture 3.
lines.text_raw: It should look like picture 3.

lines.text: Fold top point down to bottom again.
lines.text_raw: Fold top point down to bottom again.

lines.text: Press down the center to form triangles as in picture 2.
lines.text_raw: Press down the center to form triangles as in picture 2.

lines.text: Fold each corner as shown.
lines.text_raw: Fold each corner as shown.

lines.text: Open the top flap. There is a little pocket on the bottom.
lines.text_raw: Open the top flap. There is a little pocket on the bottom.

lines.text: Being very careful, insert the top point into the bottom pocket. This will lock the heart in place.
lines.text_raw: Being very careful, insert the top point into the bottom pocket. This will lock the heart in place.

lines.text: This is what it looks like after being tucked in.
lines.text_raw: This is what it looks like after being tucked in.

lines.text: Now just fold the top down a bit. This will make the curve of the heart.
lines.text_raw: Now just fold the top down a bit. This will make the curve of the heart.

lines.text: Turn it over and there you have it!
lines.text_raw: Turn it over and there you have it!

lines.text: Put a pin on the back and wear it for Valentine's Day.
lines.text_raw: Put a pin on the back and wear it for Valentine's Day.

guide.summary: Let's make a cute little heart. These are easy and can be put on pins to wear.
guide.title: Origami Valentine Heart
